title: Bulldog puppy Hulk trembles with excitement while in a deep sleep
text:
A dog owner has captured her two-week old bulldog puppy trembling with excitement as it dreams.

Nikki Palakovic, 46, filmed Hulk as he lay with his eyes shut and belly on show at home in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania.

His two-year-old mother Maisy carefully watched over her snoozing pup.

Adorable two-week old bulldog puppy Hulk trembled with excitement while in a deep sleep at home in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. Little Hulk's legs twitch as his owner Nikki Palakovic, 46, says: 'Who's the nicest baby?' (right)

The camera then pans up to show Hulk's mother Maisy watching over her sleeping pup. Their besotted owner then says: 'There's mama, right there watching'

Ms Palakovic said the adorable puppy was named Hulk because of his big belly and considerably large size.

In the video, filmed on October 7, the tiny puppy shakes as he lies on his back.

As Hulk snoozes peacefully, Ms Palakovic says: 'Somebody's dreaming.'

The camera then pans up to show a larger dog watching over the puppy.

Their besotted owner then says: 'There's mama, right there watching.'

The larger dog looks at Ms Palakovic before the camera pans back down.

Little Hulk's legs twitch as his owner says: 'Who's the nicest baby?'

Ms Palakovic said: 'Hulk was the only one in his litter, but Maisy's sister had a litter too ten days later.

'Hulk's cousins also do this, but they are not as big and fat as him.'
description: Nikki Palakovic, 46, filmed the dog at home in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania while Hulk's two-year-old mother Maisy watched over her sleeping pup. Hulk got his name because of his big belly.
